Welcome to PolSARtools‚Äô Documentation!#

PolSARtools is a Python package available on PyPI üêç that generates derived SAR parameters, including:

  • üåÄ Polarimetric descriptors

  • üåø Vegetation indices

  • üß© Polarimetric decomposition parameters

It supports input from various SAR sensors or directly from polarimetric matrices such as: S2, C3, T3, C2, T2.

üìò Tutorial Notebooks#

Get started quickly with hands-on examples! Explore our step-by-step tutorials here: üëâ polsartools-notebooks üìì‚ú®

üìö Cite Us!#

If you use PolSARtools in your research or projects, we‚Äôd really appreciate a citation! üõ∞Ô∏è‚ú®

Please cite our work as:

Bhogapurapu, N., Dey, S., Mandal, D., Bhattacharya, A., and Rao, Y.S. (2021). PolSAR tools: A QGIS plugin for generating SAR descriptors. Journal of Open Source Software, 6(60), p.2970. üîó https://doi.org/10.21105/joss.02970

Contents:

    • üíæ Installation
    • Example Usage

      • How to Contribute
    • üêû Bug Reporting
    • üí° Feature Requests
    • üìö Cite Us!
      • BibTeX üìÑ
  • Supported sensors
    • üî∏UAVSAR
      • GRD (uavsar_grd)
      • MLC (uavsar_mlc)
    • üî∏NISAR
      • RSLC (nisar_rslc)
      • GSLC (nisar_gslc)
    • üî∏RADARSAT-2
      • Full-pol (rs2_fp)
    • üî∏ALOS-2 PALSAR-2
      • FBD L1.1 (alos2_fbd_l11)
      • HBQ L1.1 (alos2_hbq_l11)
    • üî∏Chandrayaan-II (DFSAR)
      • Full-pol (chyaan2_fp)
  • Functions
    • Full-pol functions
      • Full-pol data format
      • H/A/Œ± Decomposition (halphafp)
      • Yamaguchi 4-Component decomposition (yam4cfp)
      • Model Free 3-Component decomposition (mf3cf)
      • Model Free 4-Component decomposition (mf4cf)
      • Neumann decomposition (neufp)
      • Non-negative Eigen Value decomposition (nnedfp)
      • Shannon entropy (shannon_h_fp)
      • Radar Vegetation Index (rvifp )
      • Generalized volume based Radar Vegetation Index (grvi)
      • Polarimetric Radar Vegetation Index (prvifp )
      • Degree of Polarization (dopfp)
    • Compact-pol functions
      • Compact-pol data format
      • Compact-pol Radar Vegetation Index (cprvi)
      • improved S-\(\Omega\) decomposition (misomega)
      • Model Free 3-Component decomposition (mf3cc)
      • Degree of Polarization (dopcp)
    • Dual-pol functions
      • Dual-pol data format
      • Radar Vegetation Index (rvidp)
      • Dual-pol Radar Vegetation Index (dprvi)
      • Polarimetric Radar Vegetation Index (prvidp)
      • Degree of Polarization (dopdp)
      • H/Œ± decomposition (halphadp)
      • Shannon entropy (shannon_h_dp)
      • Model Free 3-Component decomposition for dual-co-pol (mf3cd)
      • Dual-pol Radar Vegetation Index for GRD (dprvic)
      • Dual polarimetric descriptors (dp_desc)
    • Polarimetric speckle filters
      • Refined-Lee filter (rlee)
      • Boxcar filter (boxcar)
    • other functions
      • Generate pauliRGB for FP data (pauliRGB)
      • Generate false color RGB for DP/CP data (dxpRGB)
      • Full-pol H-alpha plot (halpha_plot_fp)
      • Dual-pol H-alpha plot (halpha_plot_dp)
  • References
